ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Rural Indian Development Society (RIDS) is a national level Not-for-profit organization working to for the most vulnerable sections of the society. RIDS was registered as under Indian Trust Act, 1882 in the year 2009 in holy city of Banaras in Uttar Pradesh. It is supported and patronised by citizens from all walks of life. Since its inception, we have adopted a multi-pronged approach of alleviation which is more inclusive, equitable and holistic. So far RIDS is involved in understanding, documenting, disseminating and ameliorating the fundamental problems of communities of Eastern Uttar Pradesh, Uttarakhand and Delhi NCR. Education, Health and Environment awareness has been our area of work so far

ngoList.title: Saikripa
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Saikripa works with the objective of providing overall development to the homeless and underpriviledged children. Bal Kutir was started to provide a homelike atmosphere to the orphaned and homeless children. We run Sai Shiksha Sansthan a co-educational secondary english medium rural school established in the year 1991 near Noida. The school provides English medium education to the children of the villagers at a very nominal fee.We also run Sai Bal Sansar a non formal education centre for street children functioning since 1999. Recently, Saikripa received the "Real Heroes" award which was jointly presented by CNN-IBN and Reliance Industries Ltd.
